alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 2:45PM PST until December 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Dangerous Winter Storm to Produce Very Heavy Snow with Strong Winds and Whiteout Conditions... .A strong winter storm will bring very heavy snow to the mountains of northern California. Snow showers will become moderate to heavy snow this evening and will continue into tomorrow. Snow levels will gradually lower over time through late Monday and Tuesday. Expect tremendous snow accumulation at pass levels with yardsticks required for snow measurement. This will results in significant travel delays with extremely difficult to impossible travel over the mountains. Strong winds will further reduce visibilities during this event with whiteout conditions. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Travel will be very difficult to impossible, including during the evening commute on Monday. Damage to trees and power lines is possible. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 feet, Localized accumulations exceeding 6 feet at higher elevations. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada including Interstate 80 over Donner Pass, Highway 50 over Echo Summit and Highway 88 over Carson Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 PM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means there will be snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Travel is not recommended while the warning is in effect. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
